issue.title: Expose setters for Decimal vector that take long and double inputs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4923](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4923). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add new set methods on DecimalVector to take long and double inputs.

Methods should set Decimal value at given index like other setters available.
